column1: Military expenditure by country, in millions of US$ at current prices and exchange rates, 2000-2022      © SIPRI 2022
Figures are in US $m., in current prices, converted at the exchange rate for the given year.
Figures in blue are SIPRI estimates. Figures in red indicate highly uncertain data.
". ." = data unavailable. "xxx" = country did not exist or was not independent during all or part of the year in question.
